title: The Favorites - Guest Jimmy Traina
itunes:title: The Favorites - Guest Jimmy Traina
description:
Today's guest Jimmy Traina has spent over 20 years as a writer/producer at SI.com, becoming one of the most widely-respected names in sports media today. Both his daily column Traina Thoughts and his weekly Sports Illustrated Media Podcast episodes are mandatory consumption for those eager to understand the evolving landscape of sports media. 

Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter pepper Jimmy with questions about the ManningCast, the impact of sports betting on modern sports broadcasting, and more. But first, the longtime bettor makes his stance as fervently "pro-gambling" crystal clear. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
